summary: The reconstruction package supplies core utilities for MRI data handling and processing in MONAI, including operations on complex-valued tensors, a reader for fastMRI HDF5 datasets that extracts k-space and image data with acquisition metadata, and functions to compute root-sum-of-squares magnitudes for multi-coil acquisitions.
business_intent: Enable researchers and developers to build and integrate MRI reconstruction workflows and AI models by providing ready-to-use data loading and signal processing tools that streamline handling of complex MRI data.
